headline: Pentagon To Punish Habitually Late Contractors. These Defense Stocks Fall
summary: The Pentagon is undertaking a review of all major defense contractors. Those considered to be habitually late will be punished.

raw.headline: Pentagon To Punish Habitually Late Contractors. These Defense Stocks Fall

headline: El Paso Airport Closure Shows the Direction of Military Drone Technology
summary: It was a chaotic time for travelers in El Paso, Texas, with the airspace shut down late Tuesday and then reopened on Wednesday.  The Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday the temporary closure was lifted and there “was no threat to commercial aviation.”

raw.headline: El Paso Airport Closure Shows the Direction of Military Drone Technology
raw.summary: It was a chaotic time for travelers in El Paso, Texas, with the airspace shut down late Tuesday and then reopened on Wednesday.  The Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday the temporary closure was lifted and there “was no threat to commercial aviation.”

headline: RTX's Raytheon's non-kinetic Coyote variant defeats multiple drone swarms
summary: Raytheon, an RTX business (NYSE: RTX), successfully showcased the capabilities of Coyote® Block 3 Non-Kinetic (NK) during a recent U.S. Army demo. The system defeated drone swarms launched during the exercise and demonstrated exceptional launch, flight, intercept, and recovery capabilities.

raw.headline: RTX's Raytheon's non-kinetic Coyote variant defeats multiple drone swarms

headline: RTX Corporation: The Aerospace Cash Powerhouse Despite GTF Crisis
summary: RTX Corporation delivered a strong Q4 2025, with sales up 12% and free cash flow surging to $3.2 billion. Read why RTX stock is a Buy.
